/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, lined with trees on both sides, stretches out into the distance. Bare trees, devoid of leaves, stand tall on either side of the street, their branches reaching out towards the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. In the distance, a large metal structure looms, its purpose unknown but adding an element of intrigue to the landscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, emphasizing the vastness of the sky and the expanse of the street.
